query: Can you help construct a travel plan that begins in Philadelphia and includes visits to 3 different cities in Virginia? The trip duration is for 7 days, from March 15th to March 21st, 2022, with a total budget of $1,800.

plan.transportation: Flight Number: F3730367, from Philadelphia to Richmond, Departure Time: 14:03, Arrival Time: 15:03

plan.attraction: Virginia Museum of Fine Arts, Richmond; Canal Walk, Richmond

plan.transportation: Self-driving, from Richmond to Petersburg, duration: 25 minutes
plan.lunch: Tea'se Me - Rooftop Tea Boutique, Petersburg, cost: 25
plan.accommodation: Great Studio Apartment, 15-20mins from Downtown, Petersburg, cost: 150.00

plan.attraction: Centre Hill Mansion-Museum, Petersburg; Graffiti Art "Mechanical Wings", Petersburg
plan.accommodation: Great Studio Apartment, 15-20mins from Downtown, Petersburg, cost: 150.00

plan.transportation: Self-driving, from Petersburg to Charlottesville, duration: 1 hour 30 mins
plan.lunch: Cake Central - Premier Cake Design Studio, Charlottesville, cost: 25
plan.accommodation: Sunny spacious room full of good energy, Charlottesville, cost: 150.00

plan.attraction: Monticello, Charlottesville; Ix Art Park, Charlottesville
plan.accommodation: Sunny spacious room full of good energy, Charlottesville, cost: 150.00
